Requests.GetAllStudentsQuery: SELECT Id, Personal_Number, Group_Name, Student_Last_Name, Student_First_Name, Student_Patronymic_Name FROM Students_List
Requests.AddStudentQuery: INSERT INTO Students_List (Personal_Number, Group_Name, Student_Last_Name, Student_First_Name, Student_Patronymic_Name) VALUES (@personal_Number, @group_Name, @student_Last_Name, @student_First_Name, @student_Patronymic_Name)
Requests.GetStudentByIdQuery: SELECT Id, Group_Name, Student_Last_Name, Student_First_Name, Student_Patronymic_Name FROM Students_List WHERE Personal_Number = @personal_Number
Requests.EditStudentQuery: UPDATE Students_List SET Personal_Number = @personal_Number, Group_Name = @group_Name, Student_Last_Name = @student_Last_Name, Student_First_Name = @student_First_Name, Student_Patronymic_Name = @student_Patronymic_Name WHERE Id = @id
